title: FAT LEONARD - #9: Different Spanks
description: With Leonard in jail, the Navy investigates hundreds of officers. But they spare top admirals. Tom’s relationship with Leonard reaches breaking point. A major trial of U.S. Navy officers is set to start in February. Watch out for bonus episodes.
itunes:title: FAT LEONARD: Different Spanks
itunes:subtitle: With Leonard in Jail, the Navy Protects Its Own
author: podcastsprojectbrazen@gmail.com (Project Brazen Originals)
